title.@value: Aetiological considerations associated with lack of knowledge or experience

definition.@value: This category should be assigned when, in the clinician’s judgment, the individual’s lack of knowledge or experience of her or his own body, sexual functioning, and sexual response is an important contributing factor to the Sexual Dysfunction or Sexual Pain Disorder. This includes inaccurate information or myths about sexual functioning.

label.@value: Aetiological considerations associated with lack of knowledge or experience
